snippet.title: The Chameleon - COMING JULY 13! - PC Release Date Trailer
snippet.description:
A tense stealth game with super-powers, set in the 70s, filled with glorious fat pixels. Transform into enemies, dash, teleport, slow time and super-punch your way through this moody retro stealth game.

Coming July 13, 2021

Wishlist:
Steam - https://store.steampowered.com/app/1493970/The_Chameleon/
EGS - https://www.epicgames.com/store/en-US/p/the-chameleon
